short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Module for expanding the functionality of marketing platforms

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This module is designed to aid marketing professionals, media buyers, and entrepreneurs in overseeing advertising campaigns and projects across major marketing platforms such as Meta, TikTok, and Google. The extension allows for the quick addition of time-sensitive notes and crucial information without requiring the user to navigate away from the platform's website.
